feedback: The package arrived four days late, and I wasn’t given any updates about the delay. It was frustrating because I needed the item urgently.
My delivery came three days late despite being marked as 'on-time' in the tracking system. This is unacceptable and needs improvement.
I ordered this for a specific date, but the package didn’t arrive until two days after. The delay caused a lot of inconvenience.
The delivery was delayed by a week, and there was no communication from the company. This is the second time this has happened.
The package arrived on time, but the box was badly damaged. Luckily, the contents were usable, but it still left a bad impression.
When my order was delivered, the item was cracked and unusable. It seems like no care was taken during handling.
The product was packaged poorly and arrived with significant damage. I had to go through the hassle of requesting a replacement.
The delivery driver dropped the package at my door, but the box was soaked and falling apart. The item inside was completely ruined.
I had a great experience! The package arrived on time, and the updates throughout the process were very helpful.
Fantastic service! My order was delivered quickly and in perfect condition. I couldn’t be happier.
